named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_TEMPLATES_FOR_DEFAULT_LOCALE
named-query.query: SELECT pageTemplate FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageTemplate pageTemplate WHERE pageTemplate.locale.defaultFlag = true

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND (page.pageTemplate.locale = :fullLocale OR page.pageTemplate.locale = :languageOnlyLocale) AND (page.offlineFlag is null OR page.offlineFlag = false)
